@DavidWells @AdamRackis I agree with the observation, but disagree with the conclusion. After a decade working at agencies on BigCo sites I can say this was usually a symptom of legacy tech choices and lock-in. Not desire, effort, expense, or pain. And that the users and ROI, almost always suffered.
